name: Tincture of Herbs
description: Herbal medicine that grants a mild health boost and cleanses minor ailments, brewed from wild herbs found in the wasteland

name: Vial of Healing
description: Restorative potion that swiftly heals wounds, a vital tool for adventurers in the midst of battle or recovery.

name: Coffee Candy
description: A caffeinated treat that provides a quick energy boost, sharpening focus and dispelling fatigue for a short duration.

name: Vial of Mana
description: Magical potion replenishing mana energy, essential for spellcasters seeking to restore their magical prowess during intense encounters.

name: Vial of Antidote
description: Potent remedy that counteracts toxins, a crucial tool for survival in a wander in wasteland.

name: Flask with Acid
description: Corrosive substance capable of melting through obstacles or weakening foes' armor, a tactical tool for alchemists and strategists.

name: Mechanical Grenade
description: Deployable explosive device with shrapnel, crafted by skilled engineers, ideal for disrupting enemy formations or dealing area-of-effects damage.

name: Fire Grenade
description: Incendiary explosive designed to create a burst of flames, useful for controlling crowds or inflicting fiery chaos on adversaries.
